title: Bug 17703 - Edit/Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
description: The Edit/Add Task action is not using the correct dialog when executed from the Packages view.
OB: When you select a Java Compilation Unit (CU) in the Packages view and execute the Edit/Add Task action, you get a different dialog compared to executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The Edit/Add Task action when executed from the Packages view should use the same dialog as the Java Editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Packages view.
2. Select a Java Compilation Unit (CU) in the Packages view.
3. Right-click on the selected CU.
4. Choose the 'Edit/Add Task' action.
5. Observe that a different dialog is displayed.

Expected behavior:
1. The same dialog should be displayed as when executing the 'Edit/Add Task' action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
